group_1.narration: [textBlack:A certain girl meets]@[textBlack:with a strange animal that speaks.]
[textBlack:Just like that,]@[textBlack:a mysterious diary appeared in a flash of light,]@[textBlack:and then disappeared somewhere...]

group_1.textRight: ...The blank pages have been filled in...

group_1.textLeft: In that book...?

group_1.textRight: It's a...diary formed from your wish.
Or I should say it's a "book," though it may only@be taking the form of one.
It's produced from the hope within the book@"Christmas Bonds."
And within this diary is...
Detailed records of all events that have happened@until today.
It may perhaps even have our futures written@inside.
Is it because of this diary that we took on the@form of Guardian Spirits?
Or was this diary created because this girl@became a Magical Girl...
And we simply played the role of Guardian@Spirits?
Whether we can call it the chicken or the egg...@I just don't know.

group_1.textLeft: That question has been pondered for quite a@long time by people.
Don't we have an answer to it now?

group_1.textRight: ...We do?

group_1.textLeft: It's the Bootstrap Paradox cycle of cause and@effect.
...Though that's a lazy explanation.
Whether a chicken or egg comes first, we don't@know, so it's useless to ponder.
But because there is no contradiction, there is@no time paradox.
And because there is no time paradox, we won't@disappear.
...That is all!

group_1.textRight: ...So I see.

group_1.textLeft: More importantly, I'm curious about one thing@regarding this diary.
Everything within the diary should be set in@the past.
But why are there blank pages left halfway@through...

group_1.textRight: When we were aiding this girl's mama and papa,@right?

group_1.textLeft: Right...

group_1.textRight: It's a bit of a romantic answer...
But I think we were entrusted to take care of it...
By our own free will.

group_1.textLeft: Why?

group_1.textRight: We are, for the time being...
Required to be holy Christmas Guardian Spirits.
If, for example...
We were forced to help others just to save@ourselves...
Would we be called real Guardian Spirits?
Real Guardian Spirits were supposed to be@summoned here...
But since we saved people of our own will,@we were qualified to be sent here.

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm...the diary was testing us?

group_1.textRight: I believe so.

group_1.textLeft: Uh...umm...?

group_1.textRight: Ahh...sorry.
I was just...having a little secret chat with my@fellow Guardian Spirit.

group_1.textLeft: So that's what was going on...

group_1.textRight: Now then...
Your wish was granted, but is there anything@you would like us to do?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...!

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: The time when the Guardian Spirits met Mama@and Papa...
Please tell me all about it!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*
...Then we have a lot to talk about.
